scripts.start: (cd frontend && npm start) & (cd server && npm start)
scripts.build: npm run build:clean && npm run build:frontend && npm run build:frontend:copy && npm run build:server:copy
scripts.build:clean: rm -rf build && mkdir build && mkdir build/public && mkdir build/public/uploads && mkdir build/public/thumbnails && mkdir build/public/metadata
scripts.build:server:copy: cp server/server.js build/server.js && cp server/package.json build/package.json
